name: Thank You for Being a Friend
name_original: Thank You for Being a Friend
description:
Thank You for Being a Friend

A game created for Brain Jam 2015 that reflects on the new ways that friends support each other during difficult times through social media.

Developer team: Anna and Deidre

Art Director and lead: Deidre

Musical Score: Melania

Sound Design: Adriane

Writing and Producer: Alejandra

Social Work Consultant: Laura

Send some love (or requests for skills on a project) to the team:

Anna @anniesqueedle
